info.+content: I tanti segreti di un cuore innamorato - Wedding Peach
Wedding Peach - Die Engel der Liebe
愛天使伝説ウェディング・ピーチ

There are three known worlds—the human world, the angel world, and the devil world. The evil queen Raindevilla yearns to destroy the angel world with the help of her many devil minions. The goddess Aphrodite sends the handsome male angel Limone to the human world to awaken three Love Angels: Momoko Hanasaki, Hinagiku Tamano, and Yuri Tanima, who together become Wedding Peach, Angel Daisy, and Angel Lily. Even though they're busy saving the world, they are still normal high school girls who find themselves falling in love. The three girls must fight to restore peace to the angel world by gathering all pieces of the Saint Something Four and defeating the evil queen once and for all, all while protecting the person most precious in their hearts.
#1: "Yume Miru Ai Tenshi" (夢見る愛天使; Dreaming Love Angels) by FURIL (eps 1-27)
#2: "Wedding Wars - Ai wa Honō" (Wedding Wars～愛は炎～) by Erina Nakajima (eps 28-51)
#1: "21-seiki no Juliette" (21世紀のジュリエット; 21st Century Juliette) by FURIL
#3: "Wedding Wars ~Ai wa Honō~" (Wedding Wars～愛は炎～; Love is a Flame) by Erina Nakajima (ep 51)
"21-seiki no Juliette (21世紀のジュリエット; 21st Century Juliette)" by FURIL (eps 18,20)
"Hitomi no Oku de Dakishimete" (瞳の奥で抱きしめて; Embrace Me Inside of Your Eyes) by FURIL (eps 18-19)
"Wedding Wars ~Ai wa Honō~" (Wedding Wars～愛は炎～; Love is a Flame) by Erina Nakajima (ep 47)
"Yume Miru Ai Tenshi" (夢見る愛天使; Dreaming Love Angels) by FURIL (eps 13,15,17)
"Zutto Aitakatta" (ずっと逢いたかった; I've Missed You For So Long) by FURIL (ep 24)
